snippet: April was the best month for job growth in quite a while, but recovery is still painfully slow.
abstract: Editorial offers context for interpreting latest jobs report; notes wages remain flat, nearly 10 million unemployed people are looking for jobs, and millions more have stopped looking for work altogether; criticizes lawmakers who have repeatedly undermined the economic recovery by emphasizing deficit reduction rather than economic growth.
lead_paragraph: April was the best month for job growth in quite a while, but recovery is still painfully slow.

headline.main: A Better Economy, Still Far From Good
headline.print_headline: A Better Economy, Still Far From Good
